SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.connection

Interface RMI

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIInterface
public interface RMI extends Remote
Defines the methods the client can use to call the Server using RMI

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    chatToAll(String nickname, String message)
    Method called from the client that pass to the server the chat message for all connected players of the game The server sends to all the other clients the message
    void
    chatToPlayer(String sender, String receiver, String message)
    Method called from the client that pass to the server the chat message for all connected players of the game The server sends to all the other clients the message
    void
    insertCard(String nickname, ArrayList<ItemCard> cards, int column)
    Method called from the client that pass to the server the Tiles inserted by the client and in which column he wants to put them Send a request for the checking procedure in the gameController and update the Model if the controls are successfully done
    void
    login(String nickname, RMIClientConnection client)
    Method called by the client to start the connection to the server Create a ClientHandlerRMI for the client and start the checking procedure, sending a request to the connection client
    void
    pong()
    Method called by the client to see if the server is online
    void
    selectCard(String nickname, ArrayList<Integer> positions)
    Method called from the client that pass to the server the position of the Tiles selected by the client Send a request for the checking procedure in the gameController and update the Model if the controls are successfully done
    void
    setPlayerNumber(String client, int number, String gameName)
    Method called by the client only if he is the first connected to the server Check that he is the first and then set the number of players for the game
    void
    setSavedGames(boolean wantToSave, String gameName)
    Called when the player wants to resume a saved game.

  • Method Details

    • login

      void login(String nickname, RMIClientConnection client) throws RemoteException
      Method called by the client to start the connection to the server Create a ClientHandlerRMI for the client and start the checking procedure, sending a request to the connection client
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the client
      client - is a pointer to the client connectionRMI
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • insertCard

      void insertCard(String nickname, ArrayList<ItemCard> cards, int column) throws RemoteException
      Method called from the client that pass to the server the Tiles inserted by the client and in which column he wants to put them Send a request for the checking procedure in the gameController and update the Model if the controls are successfully done
      Parameters:
      nickname - of this client
      cards - are the Tiles selected by the client in order
      column - where to put the Tiles
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • selectCard

      void selectCard(String nickname, ArrayList<Integer> positions) throws RemoteException
      Method called from the client that pass to the server the position of the Tiles selected by the client Send a request for the checking procedure in the gameController and update the Model if the controls are successfully done
      Parameters:
      nickname - of this client
      positions - of Tiles selected by the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • setPlayerNumber

      void setPlayerNumber(String client, int number, String gameName) throws RemoteException
      Method called by the client only if he is the first connected to the server Check that he is the first and then set the number of players for the game
      Parameters:
      client - that sends the request
      number - of players in the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • chatToAll

      void chatToAll(String nickname, String message) throws RemoteException
      Method called from the client that pass to the server the chat message for all connected players of the game The server sends to all the other clients the message
      Parameters:
      nickname - of this client
      message - to send to all the connected players
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • chatToPlayer

      void chatToPlayer(String sender, String receiver, String message) throws RemoteException
      Method called from the client that pass to the server the chat message for all connected players of the game The server sends to all the other clients the message
      Parameters:
      sender - of the message
      receiver - of the message
      message - to send to all the connected players
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • pong

      void pong() throws RemoteException
      Method called by the client to see if the server is online
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI

    • setSavedGames

      void setSavedGames(boolean wantToSave, String gameName) throws RemoteException
      Called when the player wants to resume a saved game.
      Parameters:
      wantToSave - true if he wants to resume a game.
      gameName - the name of the game to be resumed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurred calling the server RMI
